Name: Citrus Rum Cooler
Ingredients: 30 ml Light white rum (charcoal-filtered 1-4 years old)
15 ml Grand Marnier or other cognac orange liqueur
Instructions: SHAKE first three ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass. TOP with lemonade. Lightly stir and serve with straws.
Review: Light, fruity, easy and very refreshing.
Nutrition: One serving of Citrus Rum Cooler contains 129 calories
